Package battleship.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
battleship.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class manages the game logic for Battleship.

    • isShowingPlayerGrid

      public boolean isShowingPlayerGrid()
      Checks if the player's grid is currently being shown.
      Returns:
      true if the player's grid is shown, false otherwise.

    • setShowingPlayerGrid

      public void setShowingPlayerGrid(boolean showingPlayerGrid)
      Sets whether to show the player's grid or the opponent's grid.
      Parameters:
      showingPlayerGrid - true to show the player's grid, false to show the opponent's grid.

      Starts the game by placing opponent's ships and initiating player's turn.
